snippet: Day 1 of deliberations by the jury of eight women and four men concluded without a verdict in the trial of the former Goldman Sachs director Rajat K. Gupta.
abstract: Day 1 of deliberations by the jury of eight women and four men concluded without a verdict in the trial of the former Goldman Sachs director Rajat K. Gupta.

headline.main: Jurors Begin Deliberations in Insider Trading Trial
headline.print_headline: Jurors Begin Deliberations In Insider Trading Trial
